message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a price that I think is very reasonable. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

I understand you're on a tight budget, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $9500 for the product. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on funds. Would you be willing to consider $8500?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I need to get a bit closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $9000, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on funds. Would you be willing to consider $8250?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to the minimum price I need to sell the product for, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $9500, but I think we both know that's not going to happen. I'll make one more serious offer: $9250. That's as low as I'm willing to go. Will you meet me there?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short on funds. Would you be willing to consider $8500?
